description.value:
Requirements You're wielding a loaded firearm.

Who needs words when the roar of a gun is so much more succinct? You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] a foe by firing your weapon into the air, using the firearm's maximum range rather than the usual range of 30 feet. This check doesn't take the â€“4 circumstance penalty if the target doesn't share a language with you.
